reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures were clear, and she was always available during office hours. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Interesting class, but often went off-topic. Grading was fair but inconsistent at times.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Challenging class, but Dr. Parker explains difficult concepts well. The exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: The material was hard to follow, and the professor didn’t provide much guidance.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: One of the best professors! Her lectures were engaging, and assignments were thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is knowledgeable and approachable. The material was difficult, but he made it interesting.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Sometimes confusing, but if you go to office hours, she clears things up. Exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Great professor, but the class requires a lot of effort. Lab work was particularly challenging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Anderson was amazing! She made complex theories easy to understand. Take her class if you can!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Too much reading and the professor barely explains the material in class. Not a great experience.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: The lectures were informative, but the professor moved too quickly through the material.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Engaging and knowledgeable. Professor Lee really knows his subject, and the discussions were insightful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an amazing professor! She provides great feedback on essays and fosters critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: I found the class confusing, and the professor’s explanations weren’t very helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Very engaging class! Dr. Brown made the subject come alive with her real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Professor White was okay, but the lectures were dry. The tests were fair though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is a phenomenal lecturer! His storytelling made history feel like an adventure.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor, but the assignments were quite challenging. Learned a lot in the process.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: The lectures were useful, but the group projects were poorly organized. A decent class overall.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding. Dr. Morgan is an expert in his field, and you’ll learn a lot if you put in the effort.
